--- select_singer_with_select_in_from_and_as.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM (
  SELECT
    *
  FROM
    Singers
  WHERE
    SingerID = 1
) as S

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      83,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  10,
        Expr: nil,
        Star: true,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: parser.FromItemList{
      &parser.FromItem{
        end:  83,
        Expr: &parser.SubQueryJoinExpr{
          end:  83,
          Expr: &parser.SubQuery{
            pos:  16,
            end:  78,
            Expr: &parser.Select{
              pos:      20,
              end:      76,
              Distinct: false,
              AsStruct: false,
              List:     parser.SelectExprList{
                &parser.SelectExpr{
                  pos:  31,
                  end:  32,
                  Expr: nil,
                  Star: true,
                  As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
                },
              },
              From: parser.FromItemList{
                &parser.FromItem{
                  end:  51,
                  Expr: &parser.TableName{
                    end:   51,
                    Ident: &parser.Ident{
                      pos:  44,
                      end:  51,
                      Name: "Singers",
                    },
                    Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
                    As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
                  },
                  Method: "",
                  Num:    nil,
                  Rows:   false,
                },
              },
              Where: &parser.BinaryExpr{
                Op:   "=",
                Left: &parser.Ident{
                  pos:  64,
                  end:  72,
                  Name: "SingerID",
                },
                Right: &parser.IntLit{
                  pos:   75,
                  end:   76,
                  Value: "1",
                },
              },
              GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
              Having:  nil,
              OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
              Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
            },
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   &parser.Ident{
            pos:  82,
            end:  83,
            Name: "S",
          },
        },
        Method: "",
        Num:    nil,
        Rows:   false,
      },
    },
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM Singers WHERE SingerID = 1) AS S
